Class BotPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  BotPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class BotPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.Scrollable

BotPanel.java - A GUI element giving a representation of where the robot is currently situated. It also handles input.

Revision History:

  • April 1, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Moved map logic to Robot.
  • March 19, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Refitted for updated network code.
    • Removed extraneous imports.
    • Added comments.
  • ???, ???
    • Someone made this, right?

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(int offset)
Increases the current speed by the offset given as a parameter. It does some bare-minimum error checking and sanitizing of input.

Parameters:
offset - The amount to change the speed by.
